tricks.description: A trick where the rider spins 360 degrees in the air.

tricks.name: Backflip
tricks.description: A trick where the rider flips backwards in the air.

tricks.name: Frontside 180
tricks.description: A trick where the rider spins 180 degrees in the air while facing forward.

tricks.name: Tail grab
tricks.description: A trick where the rider grabs the tail of the snowboard while in the air.

tricks.name: Nose grab
tricks.description: A trick where the rider grabs the nose of the snowboard while in the air.

tricks.name: Method
tricks.description: A trick where the rider grabs the heel edge with their back hand and the nose of the snowboard with their front hand.

tricks.name: Cab 540
tricks.description: A trick where the rider spins 540 degrees in the air while riding switch.

tricks.name: Frontside boardslide
tricks.description: A trick where the rider slides on the frontside edge of the snowboard.

tricks.name: Backside lipslide
tricks.description: A trick where the rider slides on the backside edge of the snowboard.

tricks.name: Frontside 270 on
tricks.description: A trick where the rider spins 270 degrees onto a rail or box.

tricks.name: Backside 180
tricks.description: A trick where the rider spins 180 degrees in the air while riding switch.

tricks.name: Frontside 360 shifty
tricks.description: A trick where the rider spins 360 degrees in the air while shifting their body position.

tricks.name: Frontside 540
tricks.description: A trick where the rider spins 540 degrees in the air while facing forward.

tricks.name: Backside 270 on
tricks.description: A trick where the rider spins 270 degrees onto a rail or box while riding switch.

tricks.name: Frontside lipslide
tricks.description: A trick where the rider slides on the frontside edge of the snowboard while perpendicular to the rail or box.

comments.comment: I love watching the riders perform the TailGrab, it's always so impressive!
The Double Cork 1080 is one of the most difficult tricks to execute, it's amazing to see it done flawlessly.
The Tail Grab is a classic trick that never gets old, it's great to see it still being performed at such a high level.
The Backside 180 is a staple trick in snowboarding, it's the foundation for so many other tricks.
I can't get enough of the Frontside 360, it's so smooth and stylish when executed correctly.
The Switch Backside 720 is an incredibly difficult trick, but when done well it's a thing of beauty.
The Method is a classic snowboarding trick, it's always fun to see different variations of it.
The Frontside Bluntslide is a very technical trick, it requires a lot of precision and balance to pull off.
The Indy Grab is one of my favorite tricks to watch, it's so stylish and looks great in the air.
The Backside Boardslide is a classic rail trick, it's always impressive to see it done on a high rail.
The Frontside 180 Melon Grab is a stylish trick that looks great in the air, especially when done off a big jump.
The Cab 540 is an incredible trick, it's so difficult to spin that many times and still land cleanly.
The Backside Rodeo is one of the most stylish tricks in snowboarding, it looks amazing when done well.
The Frontside 270 is a tricky trick to land, but when executed correctly it looks great.
